subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Scott Verplank was two shots behind with three holes to play yesterday, then surged into a share of the lead at the Children’s Miracle Network Classic in Lake Buena Vista, Fla., simply by making pars. Verplank wound up with a 71 and was tied with Stephen Ames going into the final round.
